text:
Excellent! All document translation functionality has been completely removed.

## ✅ Document Translation Feature Completely Removed

**What was removed:**
- ❌ All document API endpoints (`/api/documents/*`)
- ❌ Document uploader component 
- ❌ Document processors (PDF, DOCX, TXT)
- ❌ Documents page route
- ❌ Document upload directory
- ❌ Document-related dependencies
- ❌ Document navigation tabs
- ❌ Document translation buttons

**What remains functional:**
- ✅ Text-to-text translation API (`/api/translate`)
- ✅ Translation UI with language selection
- ✅ Copy/paste functionality
- ✅ All text translation features

The application now only provides **simple text translation** without any document processing capabilities. The build is clean and all references to document functionality have been removed.
